Open navigation drawer Close navigation drawer Models Models Market History Chat History History Delete Success Here\'s the generated image Image Generate progress: %1$s%% No history, please select model in the model list and chat Please allow permission to record audio Camera permission is required to take photos Camera access is needed to take photos for your chat No camera app found on this device Please install a File Manager Failed to get audio file Select Picture Select a WAV file Release to Send, Slide up to cancel Release to cancel Scroll to bottom Thinking… Has thought for %1$s seconds Copy Select text Copy success debug message copied, please report issue in github Debug Mode Close Debug Mode Debug Mode Control Close Debug Mode Are you sure you want to close debug mode? This will hide the debug mode option from settings until you activate it again by clicking the version info 5 times. Use modelscope to download Clear mmap cache Use mmap select sampler use opencl Local Available mmap cache cleared mmap not used Reloading chat session please wait for download complete and install Check for update get update info failed No update available Download Pending Update %.1f%% Resume Paused Chat Update Available: (%1$s) Show downloaded only About Settings Current Version:%1$s Select Download Provider it\'s recommended to remove unfinished tasks and redownload to prevent errors. Stop downloads when chat Stop downloads during chat ensures smoother chat experience Enable API Network Service Start OpenAI-compatible API server for external access Reset API Configuration Reset API server settings to default values Are you sure you want to reset API configuration? This will restore all API settings to default values. After that, the models will appear in the model list.
